quote: People who just float around in life without any direction will tell you that your dreams are not possible. Their knowledge is the perfect mirror of their results. Logic makes perfect sense.
quote_letters: PEOPLE WHO JUST FLOAT AROUND IN LIFE WITHOUT ANY DIRECTION WILL TELL YOU THAT YOUR DREAMS ARE NOT POSSIBLE THEIR KNOWLEDGE IS THE PERFECT MIRROR OF THEIR RESULTS LOGIC MAKES PERFECT SENSE

chat:
diminished - Reduced in size or amount.
rushes - Tall, slender, grass-like plants growing in wet areas.
accurate - Precise; correct.
geologist - Expert in the study of the earth's physical structure, substances, and history.
outflow - The flowing out of a liquid or gas from an enclosed space.
snowfall- The amount of snow that falls in a particular place.
bowlers - Players of a game that involves rolling a ball towards targets.
relocated - Moved to a different location.
asleep - In a state of sleep.
twenty-three - A numerical value that is one greater than twenty-two.
artillery - Large guns such as cannons or howitzers.
strikeouts - In baseball, a play in which the batter is called out by the pitcher throwing three strikes.
atmosphere - The mixture of gases surrounding the earth or another planet.
not-for-profit - A type of organization that does not operate for making money or profit.
unlike - Different from; not similar to.
projectile - An object that is thrown, fired, or otherwise propelled.
Humphrey - A name, often of a male person.
definition - A statement that explains the meaning of a word or term.
